entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
